title: Meet Ellis Brooklyn Founder and CEO Bee Shapiro Live on The Fashionista Network
description: Steph here. I'm so excited to share that I'll be joined by Ellis Brooklyn Founder and CEO Bee Shapiro on The Fashionista Network. But here's the best part: I want you to join me! It's your opportunity to interact live with us, ask questions and be a part of the show. In addition to her fragrance ...Continue reading
author: Steph Saltzman
